titleInfo.title: Marshy edge of swamp at side of Gentilly Station which had gone dry & grown up land grasses during last summer. Although Gambusias & Crawfish are becoming established, mosquito larvae have sufficient harborage & food yet in the dead vegetation.

mods.abstract: Contd. from title: This swamp cut off from the permanent one by levee & canal & natural forces hampered by man. Camera looking down on small pond and vegetation.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Ecology and Conservation, The Percy Viosca Jr. Collection
